entry.title: neuherbs Ashwagandha 1000 Plus Tablets Supplements [Manage Anxiety & Stress Relief] with vitamin E & B Complex for General wellness & Improve Vigour
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type: Vitamins & Minerals
Price: 399.00 - 749.00 (2 variants)

neuherbs Ashwagandha 1000 PLUS Tablets that has been made with Ashwagandha extract. These Ashwagandha tablets contain added support of Vitamins (E, B6, B9, & B12) and Piperine.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits of Ashwagandha Tablets —

  • Ashwagandha Tablets For Brain

    The use of ashwagandha has been found beneficial for managing stress, anxiety, and depression. It also enhances calmness and ensures sound sleep.

  • Ashwagandha Tablets For Immunity

    Ashwagandha is known to possess antioxidant activity that helps fight free-radical damage and enhance the body's defence system.

  • Ashwagandha Tablets For Stamina

    Ashwagandha is a known Ayurvedic Rasayana that has the ability to improve stamina, strength & reduce inflammation

— Key Ingredients —

  • Ashwagandha Extract

    To rejuvenate health & improve quality of life

  • Vitamin E & B Complex

    To deliver antioxidant care & restore cell damage

  • Piperine

    To enhance absorption of added ingredients

— How To Use —

  • Take one tablet

  • With 1 glass of water

  • Twice a day, 30 minutes after the meal

  • Is it suitable for healthy people?

    Yes, Ashwagandha is a natural ancient Ayurvedic herb that is useful in providing health benefits like boosting stamina, strength, enhancing sound sleep, immunity.

  • Does it help in a prolonged workout?

    Yes, Ashwagandha is a natural herb that is known to enhance stamina and energy levels, which helps you in doing exercise for a prolonged duration.

  • How much ashwagandha will I get?

    neuherbs Ashwagandha 1000 Plus is an extraordinary formulation that offers high strength of 1000 mg Ashwagandha extract per serving (2 tablets) with 3.5 % withanolides per serving.

  • Does it help in gaining weight?

    Stress is another reason that causes hurdles in weight gain. As ashwagandha aids in reducing stress and anxiety, in turn, it may help to maintain your weight when taken with a calorie-rich diet.

  • Does it help in improving sleep quality?

    Yes, Ashwagandha is a natural adaptogen that helps provide calmness and improve the quality of sleep.

  • What is its shelf-life?

    The Shelf-life of neuherbs Ashwagandha 1000 Plus is 24 months from the date of manufacture.

  • Is it made up of ashwagandha roots or leaves?

    neuherbs Ashwagandha is made up of natural ashwagandha root extract, with added Vitamin E & B complex (B6, B9, B12) and black pepper.

    • Which fish has been used for this?

As per supplement recommendation, one should consume it for at least 3 months to observe better results.

      Yes, neuherbs Deep Sea fish is molecularly distilled to avoid any heavy metal toxicity and make fish oil safe for human consumption.
